fulltext:
Mr. LÊ DUY HOÀNG  
SOFTWARE ENGINEER 
DoB: 19-01-1992 • Vietnamese • Email: hoangleduy92@gmail.com • Phone: (+84) 0972 809 885  
What I have to offer 
I have 5 years of industry experience in IT Architecture, IT Development and IT Support. I have 
worked with big technology firms, start-up, bank and car manufacturing companies in roles 
requiring leadership, management, consulting, communication, team work, and technical 
skills. Currently I am working as a Software Engineer & Project Lead for VisionIO – An 
application allows users form Organizations to inspect the videos from oil well detective 
camera system, which is be used by individuals and organizations all over the World.  
What I’m looking for. Is this you? 
I want to work in an environment in which I can make the best of my ability, knowledge and 
experiences to perform the job actively and creatively, from which I can learn more & improve 
myself to become a proficient Product Owner in the future. Moreover, contributing for the 
development of humanity is one of the significant motivations that lead to my appreciation. 
ACHIVEMENTS 
Microsoft Certified Solutions Developer: App Builder. (2018)  
Microsoft Certified Solutions Associate: Web Applications. (2017)  
Microsoft Certified Professional: Programming in HTML5 with JavaScript and CSS3. (2017)  
Microsoft Technology Associate: HTML5 Application Development Fundamentals. (2017) 
EDUCATION 
2010 – 2014 
FPT UNIVERSITY – Ho Chi Minh city 
Major: Software Engineering. 
Qualifications:  Bachelor’s Degree in Software Engineering. 
                            Fresher Certificate of FPT Software HCM. 
EXPERIENCES 
August 2018 – 
Present 
FULL-STACK SOFTWARE ENGINEER – Restaff - House of Norway 
Team Up Heads @upheads.no (Largest e-commerce company in Norway):  
• Implement the whole ERP system by .Net technologies. Some main management 
modules such as: Company, Sales, Marketing, Working hours, Services, Work Orders, 
Purchase/Sale orders, Supplier invoice, Accounting, Human Resources, Stock, Reports 
and Course Booking… 
• Responsibilities: Coding, testing and fixing bugs. Applied Scrum methodology. 
• Technologies: MVC5, Entity Framework, JavaScript, jQuery, MSSQL, Azure DevOps… 
• Role: Developer                                              • Team size: 10    
Team VisionIO @visionio.com (Norway):  
• Maintain and implement new features for the administrator site for Oil well detective 
camera system. Allow users to upload large file (up to 30GB) in images format to the 
system, process and transform them to appropriate definition. Introduce the Movie 
player by fetching those images. Provide 3D bowl to inspect the video by 180°. 
• Responsibilities: Meeting and discuss with Norwegian client. Create and assign tasks 
for team members.  
Develop, test, deploy and operate the whole system based on Azure Cloud services. 
Review code and write documents. Applied Kanban methodology. 
• Technologies: .NET Core, Nodejs, React, Typescript, Azure WebApp, Azure Storage, 
Azure Webjob, Azure VM… 
• Role: Team leader                                           • Team size: 3 
August 2016 – 
August 2018 
SOFTWARE ENGINEER – Devinition & Idealogic (Netherland) 
Team OpenAsApp @openasapp.net (Germany – 2mil € start-up):  
• Application allows transforming Excel file into web & mobile apps with appropriate 
app type, facility data fields or charts, wide range of functions and attractive GUIs.  
• Responsibilities: Discussing with client and analyzing User-stories, brake it into smaller 
tasks. Assign tasks for team members, implement, write unit test cases, integration test 
cases, regression test cases…  
Introduce the Chat Bot assistant to help user create and manage apps in several 
channels (Cortana, Skype, Slack, MS Team, Webchat…), which is officially release on 
Window Store. Support client to discuss with 3rd party library company: creating new 
feature ticket, reporting bugs… 
Execute CI/CD process, applied Scrum & Kanban methodology. 
• Technologies: MS Bot Framework, .NET Core 2, Identity Server 4, Web API 2, Entity 
Framework Core, FlexCel, TMS Software, DevExtreme, XUnit, MSTest, Azure…  
• Role: Team leader                                            • Team size: 3 
Team Private-lease @privatelease.citroen.nl (Netherland):  
• Implement the Car leasing E-Commerce websites base on .NET technologies (C#).  
• Responsibilities: Coding, testing and fixing bugs. Applied Scrum methodology. 
• Technologies: Web API 2, MVC5, Entity Framework 6, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3… 
• Role: Developer                                                • Team size: 3 
January 2015 –
August 2016 
SOFTWARE DEVELOPER – SystemGear (Japan) 
Team NTG5.5 @navi-expert.com (Japan – Out-sourcing for Mercedes-Benz):  
• Implement the Operating System of Intelligent Car on FlashBuilder using 
ActionScript3. Which is the first ever OS with Vietnamese UI on Mercedes-Benz car 
(Mercedes-Benz E-class model 2017).  
• Responsibilities: Design the detail-design of the screens: Class diagram, Sequence 
diagram, Screen Item Description. Coding and execute the Unit test, Integration test. 
Investigate bugs and fix them.  
• Technologies: ActionScript3 
• Role: Developer                                              • Team size: 12 
Team Shihan (Japan – Out-sourcing for Subaru & Mitsubishi):  
• Develop the Operating System for Subaru car & Internal Management Website.  
Responsibilities: Write the basic-design, detail-design, design the report template of the 
screens (BIRT report tool). Coding, testing and fixing bugs.  
• Technologies: Edamame tool, Java, Struts2, DomA, BIRT, jQuery… 
• Role: Developer                                              • Team size: 8 
April 2013 –
December 2014 
INTERNSHIP & SOFTWARE DEVELOPER – FPT Software HCM 
• Learn about security, company’s coding convention and coding style… Web 
development base on MVC3, Entity Framework, LINQ to SQL…  
• Basic knowledge about ERP business functions and business processes. Experience in 
ERP system development with Microsoft Dynamic AX and X++.  
• E-Commerce and CMS Websites development base on PHP and .NET (C#): Workpress, 
Magento, MVC4, Entity Framework, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3… 
SKILLS 
Communication  languages 
• ENGLISH: Fluently communicate with customers (2+ years’ work directly with 
international clients). Completed 5 levels Top Notch, 2 levels Summit and 3 levels 
Business English in FPT University (Equivalent with TOEIC 800+).  
• JAPANESE: Able to communicate essentially. Finished the syllabus of Mina no Nihongo 
1 & 2 at FPT University (Equivalent with N4 of JLPT).  
• VIETNAMESE: Native tongue. 
Technologies 
• Expert: C#, ASP.NET, .NET Core, ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Core MVC, RESTful APIs.  
• Advance: Entity Framework, EF Core, LINQ, SQL Server, Azure WebApp, Azure Storage, 
HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery.  
• Intermediate: Azure Webjob, Azure Virtual Machine, MS Bot Framework.  
• Fundamental: AngularJS, ReactJS, KnockOutJS, TypeScript, Java, PHP, MySQL, Azure 
Linux VM, ActionScript 3, Microsoft Dynamics AX… 
Programing  knowledge 
• Concepts & Principles: OOP, IoC, SOLID, DRY, KISS, YAGNI…  
• Design patterns: MVC, MVVM, Singleton, Factory, Builder… 
Software & 
development tools 
• Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code, Microsoft Azure.  
• SQL Server, MySQL.  
• Azure DevOps, SVN, GIT, Visual Studio Team Service, Source Tree. 
• NetBeans, Eclipse.  
Advantage 
• Many experiences with Agile development methodologies: Scrum, Kanban.  
• Strong self-education ability.  
• Strong problem-solving ability. 
• Teamwork. 
Soft skills 
• Time management.  
• Task estimation. 
• Team management.  
• Business Communication. 
HOBBIES 
               Getting lost in               Every kind of              Making music             Defense of the             Exploring YouTube 
                a good book                       sports                      on a guitar                      Ancients                             World 
The End.
